channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for FL

item.title: Report X-2023080055
item.description:
Report X-2023080055

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-26
  • City: TAMPA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package arrived already wet to the station and it was then placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment and inspection. DescribePack: The glass bottle of Titration (TNA) Solvent is shattered and completely emptied out and dried out. No padding or inner packing materials were used. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon arrival the wet package was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment. No release was found.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package received in warehouse 7am on 7-19-23 during the unloading process. The cap loosened and liquid leaked out. When leak discovered we placed jug containers and box in Hazmat tub for processing. DescribePack: The cap loosened and liquid leaked out of jug. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: When leak discovered we placed jug containers and box in Hazmat tub for processing.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: LID WAS LOOSE LOADED IN TRAILER CONTENTS SPILLED OUT DURING SHIPPING DURING THE UNLOAD PROCESS PACKAGE WAS RETRIEVED IT WAS DISCOVERRD THAT IT WAS LEAKING PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED PUT IN PLASTIC DRUM DescribePack: FAILURE OF LID CAUSE WAS DENTED DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS CONTAINED IN HAZMAT BUCKET BROUGHT TO HAZMATCAGE TO BE PROCESS

item.title: Report X-2023071166
item.description:
Report X-2023071166

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-16
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found 1 bottle of Trueline Black Max coil cleaner 1-gallon was crushed & had loose lid resulted to leakage & stained all contents inside. DescribePack: Bottle was crushed & had loose lid resulted to internal leakage & stained all contents inside. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023071155
item.description:
Report X-2023071155

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-17
  • City: FORT MYERS
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer and placed on the rollers. Package handler did not notify management hazmat had internal leak. ( Package handler may have been un aware.) Package was moved from 1 set of rollers to a second set. I was told package had spilled out onto a Package handlers shirt and his stomach is now irritated. SCMS was entered on package handler and hazmat was taken to hazmat area where was placed into a hazmat bag and spill bin. DescribePack: Hazmat states it has venting caps on product and that product is placed inside a small bag and then packaged into box with packing material ( Fiberboard Liners) package must have been loaded sideways at some point in transit because the leaking from the vent cap. Eventually pressure caused plastic bag to burst and material to leak out of plastic bag and cause internal leak and then eventually leaking onto package handlers shirt. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Once discovered package was taken to hazmat cage and placed into hazmat bag and spill bin.

item.title: Report X-2023071153
item.description:
Report X-2023071153

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-17
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023071153 SequenceEvent: The box was put into overhead sortation and was found wet in the load area, and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: The cap came loose on one of the jugs in the box, causing contents to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazbag lined tote. 2. X-2023071154 SequenceEvent: The 5-gallon jerrican was found leaking in the unload and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: Contents were leaking from under the cap on jerrican, even though the cap was on tight. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The jerrican was placed upright into a hazbag lined tote.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was found damaged and moved to the hub for reports. DescribePack: 1 jug in the box leaked contents from under the cap. The cap was on tight, and there was a seal on the spout of the jug. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazbag lined tote

item.title: Report X-2023071074
item.description:
Report X-2023071074

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-14
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1.X-2023071074 SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found a box containing 2 bottles of Rapicide PA part A 5-liter had loose lids which resulted to leakage & stained contents. Due to leakage, the 2 bottles of Rapicide PA part B 5-liter have stained marks. DescribePack: Bottles had loose lid resulted to leakage & stained contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote. 2. X-2023071083 SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found a box containing 2 bottles of Rapicide PA part A 5-liters were crushed & had loose lids resulted to leakage. DescribePack: Bottles were crushed & had loose lids resulted to leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023061321
item.description:
